Advisory.Description:
Version 3.7.2 of the popular package `eslint-scope` and version 5.0.2 were published without authorization ( see https://github.com/eslint/eslint-scope/issues/39 ). These versions contained apparently malicious code that attempted to steal npm login tokens. They have both been unpublished and are no longer available.

npm is aware of this issue and is providing updates on this issue at this page: https://status.npmjs.org/incidents/dn7c1fgrr7ng
Advisory.Summary: Critical severity vulnerability that affects eslint-scope and eslint-config-eslint
